main.name: Nidhal Baccouri
main.description: I work on developing digital twins in the automotive industry. I face IoT & AI challenges on a daily basis. I contribute regularly to open source in my free time, especially AI and python projects
main.bio: I'm a python & AI enthusiast. I can't wait to see what we will achieve in the next years. I'm a software guy, who wants to improve the software world
main.contactmessage: Feel free to contact me if you have a question about my open source projects or if you have an offer to discuss

projects.title: deep-translator
projects.category: A flexible free and unlimited python tool to translate between different languages in a simple way using multiple translators.

projects.title: gpx-converter
projects.category: python package for manipulating gpx files and easily converting gpx to other different formats

projects.title: b-rabbit
projects.category: A thread safe library that aims to provide a simple API for interfacing with RabbitMQ.

projects.title: wrabbity
projects.category: a node package that provides a simple API for interfacing with RabbitMq.

testimonials.text: I used the deep-translator package of Nidhal and I find it great
I'm using the gpx-converter package created by Nidhal and it is making my life easier
Nidhal Baccouri must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met!
